document_data.name: Tysis Kolraavi
document_data.mainbody: '''Tysis Kolraavi''' was the [[shaman]] of the [[Black Lion tribe|Black Lion]] [[Uthgardt]] tribe during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Tysis did not believe in acting diplomatically. She refused to suffer the influence of the "civilized" people.
document_data.Relationships: Tysis was the younger sister of the tribe's Great Chief, [[Stellok Kolraavi]]. She served as the only confidant her brother could truly rely upon.
